text: Azerbaijan competed in the Winter Olympic Games for the first time at the 1998 Winter Olympics in Nagano, Japan. ==Figure skating== ;Men {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !Athlete !SP !FS !TFP !Rank |- align=center |align=left| Igor Pashkevitch |13 |15 |21.5 |16 |} ;Women {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !Athlete !SP !FS !TFP !Rank |- align=center |align=left| Yulia Vorobieva |18 |16 |25.0 |16 |} ;Pairs {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !Athletes !SP !FS !TFP !Rank |- align=center |align=left| Inga Rodionova Aleksandr Anichenko |19 |18 |27.5 |18 |} Key: FS = Free Skate, SP = Short Program, TFP = Total Factored Placement ==References== *Official Olympic Reports * Olympic Winter Games 1998, full results by sports-reference.com Category:Nations at the 1998 Winter Olympics 1998 Category:1998 in Azerbaijani sport
title: Azerbaijan at the 1998 Winter Olympics
